text: Naziha Jawdet Ashgah al-Dulaimi (1923, Baghdad - 9 October 2007, Herdecke). She was one of the pioneers of feminist movement in Iraq. She was a co-founder and first president of the Iraqi Women League. She is the first woman minister in Iraq's modern history, and the first woman cabinet minister in the Arab world. ==References== Category:Iraqi human rights activists Category:Feminists Category:1923 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Iraqi politicians
title: Naziha al-Dulaimi
